about_the_game:
"

Darktide’s Night

Bonus content for The Foulest of Spirits.
 The Red Star looms high in the night sky and the world is bathed in an angry crimson glow. The forest is alive with the noises of beasts - and worse - as the magicks of Darktide and the leering red face staring down from above whips them into a frenzy. Specters and apparitions glide amongst the wagons while the shuffling steps of soulless wanderers can be heard just beyond the lantern's light. What will you do?



Note:  
This bonus mini-adventure was originally written for the Red Star Rising campaign as a small interlude in the second chapter, but can take place in any other campaign with some adjustments.
Darktide's Night includes:
  • Detailed maps and battlemaps in the popular Gooey Cube style (not available in print or PDF)
  • Five difficulty levels for each encounter
  • pre-placed tokens for each difficulty level
  • six full-color handounds
  • four Special Items


"
